attributes.action: MPs be barred from paid/non-paid second jobs and/or consultancy work.
attributes.additional_details: MPs sole objective and role should be that of being an MP. They should represent their constituents and that is the reason they were elected. Second jobs, paid or non-paid, and/consultancy work distract and dilute their role as an MP. Exemption to the law can be made for those MPs who have professional qualifications that require them to work a certain number of hours a year/month to maintain their professional qualifications, for example doctors, nurses, solicitors, and barristers.
attributes.background: To introduce a law so that MPs do not have second jobs as the MPs should focus solely on their role as an MP and representing their constituents.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630900
Ban second jobs for Members of Parliament
